steps.title: The trans flag was created in 1999 by activist Monica Helms.
steps.content: The trans flag was created in 1999 by activist Monica Helms. As an advocate for trans rights, Helms designed a flag that encompassed all members of the trans community. The light blue and light pink stripes represent men and women, while the central white stripe represents individuals who donâ€™t have a specific gender label for themselves. The white stripe can also stand for people who are currently transitioning to a different gender or intersex individuals.
